com.github.cjengineer18.desktopwindowtemplate.util.async

Class AsyncProcessLoading

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cjengineer18.desktopwindowtemplate.util.async.AsyncProcessLoading

  • public abstract class AsyncProcessLoading
extends Object
    An utility method for async process (no return, no progress monitoring).
    Author:
    Cristian Jimenez

    • Method Detail

      • loadAsyncProcess

        public static void loadAsyncProcess(Window parent,
                                    Runnable runnable)
                             throws AsyncProcessException
        Load asynchronously a process. A loading dialog will appear.
        Parameters:
        parent - A window parent. If null, a default frame is used.
        runnable - The process. If the process is a Thread subclass, you must implement it's own UncaughtExceptionHandler. Otherwise a default UncaughtExceptionHandler will be implemented in a new Thread object.
        Throws:
        AsyncProcessException - If an Exception is thrown during the async process.
        See Also:
        Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      • loadAsyncProcess

        public static void loadAsyncProcess(Window parent,
                                    Runnable runnable,
                                    String message)
                             throws AsyncProcessException
        Load asynchronously a process. A loading dialog will appear.
        Parameters:
        parent - A window parent. If null, a default frame is used.
        runnable - The process. If the process is a Thread subclass, you must implement it's own UncaughtExceptionHandler. Otherwise a default UncaughtExceptionHandler will be implemented in a new Thread object.
        message - A message that will appear in the loading dialog.
        Throws:
        AsyncProcessException - If an Exception is thrown during the async process.
        See Also:
        Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      • loadAsyncProcess

        public static void loadAsyncProcess(Window parent,
                                    Runnable runnable,
                                    String title,
                                    String message)
                             throws AsyncProcessException
        Load asynchronously a process. A loading dialog will appear.
        Parameters:
        parent - A window parent. If null, a default frame is used.
        runnable - The process. If the process is a Thread subclass, you must implement it's own UncaughtExceptionHandler. Otherwise a default UncaughtExceptionHandler will be implemented in a new Thread object.
        title - A title for the dialog.
        message - A message that will appear in the loading dialog.
        Throws:
        AsyncProcessException - If an Exception is thrown during the async process.
        See Also:
        Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
